statements: DELETE FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 100 AND username = 'john_doe';
DELETE FROM investment_accounts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND balance < 1000
DELETE FROM investment_accounts WHERE balance <= 0.00 AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe')
DELETE FROM login_history WHERE login_time < '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'jane_smith')
DELETE FROM login_attempts WHERE user_id = 12345 AND successful = false;
DELETE FROM login_attempts WHERE successful = FALSE AND user_id = 5001;
